title: Sample Book, 1820–50
medium:
Medium: cardboard, leather, paper, cotton
Technique: printed
description: Sample book with a marble printed cover and a green suede back strip containing samples of printed cotton textiles in various colors which are pasted on paper sheets.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample Book, 1820–50.
1820–50. Medium: cardboard, leather, paper, cotton
Technique: printed. Gift of Seymore DeRicci. 1921-9-1.
